## Technology Stack
- **Backend**: Python 3.10+, FastAPI, SQLAlchemy
- **Frontend**: Next.js 14, React, TypeScript, Tailwind CSS
- **AI/ML**: OpenAI API, Whisper, LangChain, Pinecone
- **Database**: PostgreSQL (production), SQLite (development)

## Project Features
1. Lecture/video transcription (live and YouTube)
2. AI-powered note generation and summarization
3. Subject/topic organization
4. Flashcard generation
5. Adaptive quizzes
6. Personalized AI tutoring
7. Weak area identification
8. Study plan generation
9. Learning style adaptation
